verses.name: Acts 10:30
verses.text: And Cornelius said, Four days ago I was fasting until this hour; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house, and, behold, a man stood before me in bright clothing,

verses.name: Acts 10:31
verses.text: And said, Cornelius, thy prayer is heard, and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God.

verses.name: Acts 10:32
verses.text: Send therefore to Joppa, and call hither Simon, whose surname is Peter; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side: who, when he cometh, shall speak unto thee.
